scripts.aws-sync: ng build && aws s3 sync dist/iot-application-front-end/ s3://devq.iot.iot-platform
scripts.aws-deploy: sam build --template template.yml && sam deploy --stack-name devq-iot-platform --template-file .aws-sam/build/template.yaml --parameter-overrides Project=IoT_Application --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND && ng build && aws s3 sync dist/iot-application-front-end/ s3://devq.iot.iot-platform
scripts.aws-tmp1: sam build && sam deploy --stack-name devq-iot-platform --template-file .aws-sam/build/template.yaml --parameter-overrides Project=IoT_Application --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND
